verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> to the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H4257>Mahalath<s%> <S%H6030>Leannoth,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite.<s%> O <S%H3068>lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> I have <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you:
Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry;<s%>
For my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7654>full<s%> of <S%H7451>troubles:<s%> and my <S%H2416>life<s%> draws <S%H5060>near<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>
I am <S%H2803>counted<s%> with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit:<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> as a <S%H1397>man<s%> that has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H353>strength:<s%>

<S%H2670>Free<s%> among the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> that <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more:<s%> and they are <S%H1504>cut<s%> off from your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
You have <S%H7896>laid<s%> me in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> in <S%H4285>darkness,<s%> in the <S%H4688>deeps.<s%>
Your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H5564>lies<s%> <S%H5564>hard<s%> on me, and you have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4867>waves.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

You have <S%H7368>put<s%> <S%H7368>away<s%> my <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; you have <S%H7896>made<s%> me an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to them: I am <S%H3607>shut<s%> up, and I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

My <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1669>mourns<s%> by <S%H4480>reason<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction:<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> on you, I have <S%H7849>stretched<s%> out my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to you.
Will you <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> to the <S%H4191>dead?<s%> shall the <S%H7496>dead<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3034>praise<s%> you? <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Shall your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> be <S%H5608>declared<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave?<s%> or your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> in <S%H11>destruction?<s%>
Shall your <S%H6382>wonders<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark?<s%> and your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5388>forgetfulness?<s%>
But to you have I <S%H7768>cried,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> shall my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> you.
<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H2186>cast<s%> you off my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> why <S%H5641>hide<s%> you your <S%H6440>face<s%> from me?
I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and ready to <S%H1478>die<s%> from my <S%H5290>youth<s%> up: while I <S%H5375>suffer<s%> your <S%H367>terrors<s%> I am <S%H6323>distracted.<s%>
Your fierce <S%H2740>wrath<s%> <S%H5674>goes<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> me; your <S%H1161>terrors<s%> have <S%H6789>cut<s%> me off.
They <S%H5437>came<s%> <S%H5437>round<s%> about me <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> like <S%H4325>water;<s%> they <S%H5362>compassed<s%> me about <S%H3162>together.<s%>
<S%H157>Lover<s%> and <S%H7453>friend<s%> have you <S%H7368>put<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, and my <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> into <S%H4285>darkness.<s%>
